languages.text: "Ты не видишь?" {n}Громогласный голос Арлекина разливается по разрушенному храму.{/n} "Вы, мон-кай, обнаружив Первый Мир, осквернили его своими примитивными технологиями. Разграбили реликвии. Изничтожили все, до последнего камня. Но самое главное — вы запятнали души наших предков, что покоились в священном вместилище, Монолите душ!"

traits.locale_text: "Ты не видишь?" {n}Громогласный голос Арлекина разливается по разрушенному храму.{/n} "Вы, мон-кай, обнаружив Первый Мир, осквернили его своими примитивными технологиями. Разграбили реликвии. Изничтожили все, до последнего камня. Но самое главное — вы запятнали души наших предков, что покоились в священном вместилище, Камне Душ!"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Do you not see it?" {n}The Harlequin's voice booms throughout the ruined temple.{/n} "When you mon-keigh discovered this Crone World, you tainted it with your crude technology. Despoiled it of its relics. Ruined all there was to the last stone. But worst of all, you sullied the souls of our ancestors reposed in their sacred vessel, the Spirit Monolith!"
languages.original_text: "Ты не видишь?" {n}Громогласный голос Арлекина разливается по разрушенному храму.{/n} "Вы, мон-кай, обнаружив Первый Мир, осквернили его своими примитивными технологиями. Разграбили реликвии. Изничтожили все, до последнего камня. Но самое главное — вы запятнали души наших предков, что покоились в священном вместилище, Монолите душ!"

Despoiled it of its relics. Ruined all there was to the last stone. But worst of all, you sullied the souls of our ancestors reposed in their sacred vessel, the Spirit Monolith!"

Despoiled it of its relics. Ruined all there was to the last stone. But worst of all, you sullied the souls of our ancestors reposed in their sacred vessel, the Spirit Monolith!"

Despoiled it of its relics. Ruined all there was to the last stone. But worst of all, you sullied the souls of our ancestors reposed in their sacred vessel, the Spirit Monolith!"

languages.text: 「分からないのかい？」{n}ハーレクィンの声が廃墟となった寺院中にとどろく。{/n}「君たちモン＝ケイはこの老朽惑星を発見したときに、星をお粗末な技術で汚したのさ。その聖遺物を強奪した。最後の石ころに至るまで、台無しにした。でも、何よりも悪いのは、聖なる船、スピリット・モノリスで安息を得た僕らの父祖の魂を汚したことだ！」
languages.original_text: "Do you not see it?" {n}The Harlequin's voice booms throughout the ruined temple.{/n} "When you mon-keigh discovered this Crone World, you tainted it with your crude technology. Despoiled it of its relics. Ruined all there was to the last stone. But worst of all, you sullied the souls of our ancestors reposed in their sacred vessel, the Spirit Monolith!"

traits.locale_text: 「分からないのかい？」{n}ハーレクィンの声が廃墟となった寺院中にとどろく。{/n}「君たちモン＝ケイはこの老朽惑星を発見したときに、星をお粗末な技術で汚したのさ。その聖遺物を強奪した。最後の石ころに至るまで、台無しにした。でも、何よりも悪いのは、聖なる船、スピリット・モノリスで安息を得た僕らの父祖の魂を汚したことだ！」
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: “难道你看不到吗？”{n}丑角的声音响彻整片废墟。{/n}“当你们这些猴子发现这个老妪世界的时候，就用你们粗糙的技术玷污了它。你们掠夺了这里所有的遗物，毁掉了这里的一切，连一块石头也不放过。但最糟糕的是，你们玷污了我们祖先的灵魂！玷污了他们的圣器，巨型灵魂石！”
languages.original_text: "Do you not see it?" {n}The Harlequin's voice booms throughout the ruined temple.{/n} "When you mon-keigh discovered this Crone World, you tainted it with your crude technology. Despoiled it of its relics. Ruined all there was to the last stone. But worst of all, you sullied the souls of our ancestors reposed in their sacred vessel, the Spirit Monolith!"

traits.locale_text: “难道你还没看到吗？”{n}丑角的声音响彻整片废墟。{/n}“当你们这些猴子发现这个老妪世界的时候，就用你们粗糙的技术玷污了它。你们掠夺了这里所有的遗物，毁掉了这里的一切，连一块石头也不放过。但最糟糕的是，你们玷污了我们祖先的灵魂！玷污了他们的圣器，巨型灵魂石！”
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: « Vous ne voyez donc pas ? » {n}vous interpelle l'Arlequin d'une voix forte dont l'écho se répercute sur les murs du temple en ruines.{/n} « Quand vous autres mon-keigh avez découvert ce monde déchu, vous l'avez souillé de vos technologies. Dépouillé de ses reliques. Réduit à l'état de ruines. Pire encore, vous avez profané les âmes de nos ancêtres qui reposaient dans leur réceptacle sacré, le Monolithe aux esprits ! »
languages.original_text: "Do you not see it?" {n}The Harlequin's voice booms throughout the ruined temple.{/n} "When you mon-keigh discovered this Crone World, you tainted it with your crude technology. Despoiled it of its relics. Ruined all there was to the last stone. But worst of all, you sullied the souls of our ancestors reposed in their sacred vessel, the Spirit Monolith!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne voyez donc pas ? » {n}vous interpelle l'arlequin d'une voix forte dont l'écho se répercute sur les murs du temple en ruines.{/n} « Quand vous autres mon-keigh avez découvert ce monde déchu, vous l'avez souillé de vos technologies. Dépouillé de ses reliques. Réduit à l'état de ruines. Pire encore, vous avez profané les âmes de nos ancêtres qui reposaient dans leur réceptacle sacré, le Monolithe aux esprits ! »
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: «¿Acaso no lo ves?». {n}La voz del Arlequín retumba en el templo en ruinas.{/n} «Cuando los mon-keigh descubristeis este mundo ancestral, lo mancillasteis con vuestra lamentable tecnología. Saqueasteis todas sus reliquias. Arrasasteis con todo, hasta la última piedra. ¡Pero lo peor de todo fue que ajasteis las almas de nuestros ancestros, que reposaban en su receptáculo sagrado, el Monolito Espiritual!».
languages.original_text: "Do you not see it?" {n}The Harlequin's voice booms throughout the ruined temple.{/n} "When you mon-keigh discovered this Crone World, you tainted it with your crude technology. Despoiled it of its relics. Ruined all there was to the last stone. But worst of all, you sullied the souls of our ancestors reposed in their sacred vessel, the Spirit Monolith!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Acaso no lo ves?». {n}La voz del Arlequín retumba en el templo en ruinas.{/n} «Cuando los mon-keigh descubristeis este mundo ancestral, lo mancillasteis con vuestra lamentable tecnología. Saqueasteis todas sus reliquias. Arrasasteis con todo, hasta la última piedra. ¡Pero lo peor de todo fue que ajasteis las almas de nuestros ancestros, que reposaban en su receptáculo sagrado, el Monolito Espiritual!».
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Seht Ihr es nicht?" {n}Die Stimme des Harlekins dröhnt durch die Ruinen des Tempels.{/n} "Als Ihr Chem-Pan-Sey diese Hexenwelt entdeckt habt, habt Ihr sie durch den Makel Eurer kruden Technologie entweiht. Ihr habt sie ihrer Relikte beraubt. Ihr habt bis auf den letzten Stein alles ruiniert, was es gab. Doch am schlimmsten ist: Ihr habt die Seelen unserer Ahnen besudelt, die in ihrem heiligen Gefäß ruhten, dem Geistesmonolithen!"
languages.original_text: "Do you not see it?" {n}The Harlequin's voice booms throughout the ruined temple.{/n} "When you mon-keigh discovered this Crone World, you tainted it with your crude technology. Despoiled it of its relics. Ruined all there was to the last stone. But worst of all, you sullied the souls of our ancestors reposed in their sacred vessel, the Spirit Monolith!"

traits.locale_text: "Seht Ihr es denn nicht?" {n}Die Stimme des Harlekins dröhnt durch die Ruinen des Tempels.{/n} "Als Ihr Chem-Pan-Sey diese Hexenwelt entdeckt habt, habt Ihr sie durch den Makel Eurer kruden Technologie entweiht. Ihr habt sie ihrer Relikte beraubt. Ihr habt bis auf den letzten Stein alles ruiniert, was es gab. Doch am schlimmsten ist: Ihr habt die Seelen unserer Ahnen besudelt, die in ihrem heiligen Gefäß ruhten, dem Geistesmonolithen!"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Gözün görmüyor mu?" {n}Arleken'in sesi, harap hâldeki tapınakta yankılanıyor.{/n} "Siz mon-keighler bu Acuze Dünya'yı keşfettiğinizde, kaba teknolojilerinizle burayı lekelediniz. Yadigârlarını yağmaladınız. Son taşına kadar harap ettiniz. En kötüsü de kutsal Ruh Monoliti'nde istirahat eden atalarımızın ruhlarına leke sürdünüz!"
languages.original_text: "Do you not see it?" {n}The Harlequin's voice booms throughout the ruined temple.{/n} "When you mon-keigh discovered this Crone World, you tainted it with your crude technology. Despoiled it of its relics. Ruined all there was to the last stone. But worst of all, you sullied the souls of our ancestors reposed in their sacred vessel, the Spirit Monolith!"

traits.locale_text: "Gözün görmüyor mu?" {n}Arleken'in sesi, harap hâldeki tapınakta yankılanıyor.{/n} "Siz mon-keighler bu Acuze Dünya'yı keşfettiğinizde, kaba teknolojilerinizle burayı lekelediniz. Yadigârlarını yağmaladınız. Son taşına kadar harap ettiniz. En kötüsü de, atalarımızın kutsal Ruh Monoliti'nde istirahat eden ruhlarına leke sürdünüz!"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader
